unnormalised: Hey guys, mental health apps are a big thing these days, right? I've been trying a few. Reminds me of that scene in "Dear Zindagi" where Alia Bhatt goes to a therapist. Wondering if they're as good as a real session at NIMHANS, Bangalore! Anyone had a good experience? Maybe with meditation stuff? Shanti, shanti. Feeling less stressed after one is the goal!
